body:
okay... besides the weird stretching out holes and zooming into it... maybe someone should tell them that gynecology is not the same as porn XD 
what the hell happened in the second half?
first half was like gorgeous, beautiful, a drawing style that seeks his own in human history!
and then suddenly we had some half-assed stuff that's not really worth being in the same comic or even on the same result page... 
sad :(
